        uid - the UID to be assigned.

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock getFollowedLock()

      • getReqLock

        public java.util.concurrent.locks.ReentrantLock getReqLock()
        This method returns the reqLock of this user useful to perform read/write operations on the data structure, accessed in a concurrent way, that contains all the friendship requests received by this user.
        Returns:
        the reqLock of this user.

      • addPostToFile

        public int addPostToFile(java.lang.String data,
                java.lang.String outFile)
        This function writes a post to the userFile to prevent a data loss in case of user failure or user not logged out properly.
        Parameters:
        data - post to be written
        outFile - the path of the output file
        Returns:
        0 if the post is successfully locally saved, -1 if an IOerror occurs while writing on file.

      • readPosts

        public int readPosts()
        This function reads all unread posts locally saved and prints them to the stdout.
        Returns:
        0 if reading is successfully completed, -1 if an IOerror occurs while reading or deleting the local file.

      • findFollowed

        public boolean findFollowed(java.lang.String foll)
        This function checks whether the user's followed list contains foll.
        Parameters:
        foll - the user to be searched.
        Returns:
        true if foll is contained in the user's followed list, false otherwise.

      • containsRequestClient

        public boolean containsRequestClient(java.lang.String name)
        This function checks whether the user's requests list contains a request from name.
        Parameters:
        name - the user-name of the request to be searched.
        Returns:
        true if there's a friendship request from name for this user, false otherwise.

      • containsFollowed

        public boolean containsFollowed(java.lang.String name)
        This function checks whether the user's followed list contains a name.
        Parameters:
        name - the user-name to be searched.
        Returns:
        true if there's a followed named name, false otherwise.

      • removeRequest

        public void removeRequest(java.lang.String name)
        This method removes a friendship request sent from name to this user.
        Parameters:
        name - the request sender's name.
